expo.name: ReactEurope
expo.description: Official react-europe app for the May 2019 conference, May 23-24 in Paris, France. Read the source or get the app store and play store links on Github: https://github.com/react-europe/react-europe-2018-mobile. Credits to Brent Vatne and Expo.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We don't track your location but some of the app modules have this feature though they are not used by the app.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera is needed to scan your QRcode.
